body.name: Dual Wireless Lavalier Microphone for Camera/iPhone/Android Phone/Laptop/Computer/GoPro, Professional Plug-Play Lapel Microphone for Video Recording, Interview, Vlogging
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Automatic Connection & Easy to Use】 Our wireless lapel microphone has a plug-and-play design that makes it easy to get started. Simply connect the receiver to your device via a Lightning cable/Type-C cable/3.5mm port/USB adapter and the wireless microphones will connect automatically. No driver installation or app download is required, making it an incredibly user-friendly option.

【Compatible with All Devices】 Our lavalier mic is perfect for Camera/GoPro/iPhone/iPad/Android phone/Tablet/Desktop PC/Laptop/MacBook/iMac/Voice Amplifier/Speaker, making it suit for a range of applications, including Interview, Meeting, podcast, vlogging, Live streaming, YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, etc. You can use the same microphone for all of your needs.

【Dual Noise Cancelling & Superior Audio Quality】 Featuring a built-in noise reduction chip and 2.4G signal transmission, our camera microphone delivers crystal clear sound in real-time with minimal background noise. The furry windscreen also helps to improve audio quality in outdoor environments, ensuring an immersive listening experience for your viewers.

【Portable & Convenient Storage】 Our mini mic comes with a storage case and extra clip, making it easy to carry and clip onto your shirt or hold by hand. The dual bluetooth lapel microphone lets you use two microphones simultaneously or independently. The wireless mic for cameras or other devices is ideal for on-the-go streaming.

【65Ft Audio Range】 With a large capacity rechargeable battery and low-power chip, our camera mic offers more than 6 hours on a single charge. The wireless range extends up to 65 feet, allowing you to record high-fidelity audio indoors and outdoors from a distance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smart Noise Reduction & 360° Omnidirectional Sound Pick Up

Professional Wireless Microphones for Recording 65Ft Distance Transmission That's how far the lapel microphone can be from the receiver with the sound still being properly picked up. 6H Long Battery Life One charged lav microphone can keep running for 6 hours, giving you plenty of time for your vlogging and video recording on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must-have microphone 👍
reviews.reviewText: The CHRIMEFLAME Dual Wireless Lavalier Microphone is simply amazing! Since I got it, it has significantly improved the quality of my video recordings. Whether I'm doing interviews, vlogs, or capturing special moments, this microphone has exceeded all my expectations.First of all, the ease of use is remarkable. The setup process was simple, and I was able to start recording within minutes. The wireless connection is stable and reliable, allowing me to move freely while maintaining excellent audio quality. Additionally, the fact that it is compatible with a wide range of devices such as cameras, iPhone/Android phones, laptops, computers, and even GoPros, makes it extremely versatile.The sound quality is exceptional. The microphone captures every spoken word with clarity, eliminating any unwanted background noise. This is especially important for me as I conduct interviews and need my voice to be heard clearly. The sound is professional and comparable to much more expensive microphones.I was also impressed by the battery life. I can record for hours without worrying about running out of power. Furthermore, the compact and lightweight design of the microphones makes them easy to carry and store.Another standout feature is the build quality. The microphones and receiver are well-made and feel solid and durable. I have no doubt that this microphone will accompany me on many recordings in the future.In summary, the CHRIMEFLAME Dual Wireless Lavalier Microphone has exceeded all my expectations. The ease of use, exceptional sound quality, long battery life, and versatility make it a must-have for anyone looking to improve the quality of their video recordings. I cannot recommend it enough!Feel free to get this microphone without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my microphone, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. This microphone is a game-changer!From the moment I started using it, I noticed a significant improvement in audio quality. The clarity and crispness are unmatched, making my voice sound professional and clear. It's like having a studio-grade microphone right at my fingertips.The setup was a breeze, and the build quality is top-notch. The sleek design adds a touch of sophistication to my workspace. I appreciate the attention to detail that went into creating this microphone. Whether you're a content creator, streamer, or just someone who loves excellent audio quality, I highly recommend this microphone. The upgrade is well worth it, and I'm giving it a solid 5 stars!Kudos to the makers for delivering a fantastic product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to connect and use
reviews.reviewText: This microphone is compact and easy to use. It took just a few seconds to sync up and connect to my computer. I am using this with a MacBook, and it connected immediately after connecting the receiver via USB-C. It was the same with my iPhone. I use it along with Microsoft Translate for live translation in my class, and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price...
reviews.reviewText: This wireless lav pairs up easily and is simple to use. Included are 2 mics (plus wind muffs), receiver and a case with all the necessary accessories. It has nice range (listed at 65 feet) with 6 hrs battery time (and 2 hours charging time). For the price this is a good value. I deducted a star because while indoor clarity is fine, outdoors in wind does reduce audio quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Feedback one camera & not connecting to iphone
reviews.reviewText: Returning the product. There was terrible high pitched feedback without using the additional plug to connect to my camera. Both mics were tested and audio had lots of crackling even with a quiet room and sitting still. Couldn’t get either mic to connect to my iPhone or my husbands. Not sure if the connectors were malfunctioning or what but it’s unusable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best mics I’ve used. I made tik tok videos and this allows me to have a clear sound and they’re cute. Also love that it comes with a case, makes life so much easier!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Works so far...still testing.
reviews.reviewText: Bought to go with my digital recorder that I use for hiking/photography. Easy to use and connections. My one quip so far is when charging the mics, the red light on them stays red and never goes out as outlined in the manual as being "fully charged". The receiver does that but neither one of the mics will, I have charged for 8 hours and the red light never goes out.Conducting tests to see if they last 6 hours. Stay tuned.**Update** Went from four stars to two... Did three tests with a fully charged receiver and (as much as I could tell) fully charged mics. After three tests = Receiver ( 3.7hrs/ 3.2hrs/ 2.8hrs), Microphones ( 3hrs/3.7hrs/4.4hrs). WHERE did they get 6hrs???This product is a failure for hiking/vlogging. It has gone to the crap pile. I will give it out to someone who only needs to record for an hour. The only thing I like is the dead cats and the case that fits my audio rig for hiking. Done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This item is super cute. It comes with a nice little case, two mics and everything you need to connect - whether it's an android, iPhone or camera. It looks to work with initial testing. Well play with it some more as I can
